title: Classification learning and stop-signal (1 year test-retest)
description: A group of eight subjects performed two tasks (selective stop-signal and probabilistic classification) on two different occasions separated by about one year.  ds000017A reflects data from timepoint 1 and ds000017B reflects data from timepoint 2.
cognitive_task_seq_name: 1 Probabilistic classification task, 2 selective stop signal task
